___timestamp.description: The time that the revision was saved in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ format.

___parent_id.description: The revision ID of the preceding revision

___text.description: The content of the revision.  Might be null if the revision content was deleted.

___user.description: Metadata about the user who saved the edit.  Might be null if the contributor information was deleted.

___text.description: The user's user_name if registered or the IP address if anon.

___page.description: Metadata about the page the revision was saved to

___title.description: The page's full name (including namespace prefix)

___redirect.description: Redirected to page name.  Otherwise, null.

___restrictions.description: The protection restrictions applied to this page.

___bytes.description: The size of revision content in bytes

___sha1.description: A sha1 hash of the revision content

___deleted.description: Represents information about the deleted/suppressed status of a revision and it’s associated data.

___text.description: Is the text of this revision deleted/suppressed?

___user.description: Is the user of this revision deleted/suppressed?

___comment.description: Is the comment of this revision deleted/suppressed?
The revision summary.  Might be null if the summary was deleted.
